Mypy brief introduction

In this webpage we are trying to introduce Mypy to you.

What is mypy?

Mypy is actually not a kind of programming language,it is a type checker, and a semantics error checker. By using 'mypy' command to run your code instead of using 'python' command, you can find bugs in your programs without even running them.

What should we know to start using mypy?

We need to install mypy on the computer first. The mypy commond is always combine with the python syntax called Type Hints . By adding typy hints to your python code, mypy can find the type error easily. For other information please go to mypy introduction .
